sentences.en: a fat lot of good it will do him.
sentences.cn: 对他一点好处也没有

sentences.en: A roll of fat jiggled on the underside of her arm.
sentences.cn: 她胳膊下侧有一层肥肉一颤一颤的。

sentences.en: a short fat man in his early fifties
sentences.cn: 一个五十岁出头的矮胖男人

sentences.en: Are you suggesting I’m too fat?
sentences.cn: 你是不是在说我太胖了？

sentences.en: Don'tspill too much fat on the barbecue as it could flare up.
sentences.cn: 不要在烤肉上浇太多的油，会烧起来的。

sentences.en: He looks much fatter than in his photo.
sentences.cn: 他看上去比相片上胖多了。

sentences.en: He took out his fat wallet and peeled off some notes.
sentences.cn: 他掏出鼓鼓的钱包，抽出几张钞票。

sentences.en: He was short and fat, with a large beer belly.
sentences.cn: 他又矮又胖，挺着个大啤酒肚。

sentences.en: I didn’t like the meat - there was too much fat on it.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢那肉——太肥了。

sentences.en: Most low-fat yogurts are about 40 calories per 100g.
sentences.cn: 大多数低脂酸奶每100克约含40卡热量。

sentences.en: Nutritionists say only 33% of our calorie intake should be from fat.
sentences.cn: 营养学家说我们所摄入的卡路里中只应有33％来自脂肪。

sentences.en: Our bone marrow contains fat in the form of small globules.
sentences.cn: 我们的骨髓中含有小球状的脂肪。

sentences.en: People should eat less fat to reduce the risk of heart disease.
sentences.cn: 人们应该减少脂肪摄入，以降低患心脏病的危险。

sentences.en: Red meat, eaten to excess, is very high in fat and calories.
sentences.cn: 过量食用的红肉中脂肪和卡路里含量很高。

sentences.en: Rolls of fat bulged over his collar.
sentences.cn: 一圈圈的赘肉从他领口溢出来。

sentences.en: She was rather fat, and her complexion was muddy and spotty.
sentences.cn: 她比较胖，脸色暗淡、多斑。

sentences.en: Sunflower margarine has the same fat content as butter.
sentences.cn: 向日葵所制人造黄油的脂肪含量与黄油脂肪含量相同。

sentences.en: The body is made up primarily of bone, muscle, and fat.
sentences.cn: 人体主要是由骨骼、肌肉和脂肪构成。

sentences.en: The fat, broad tyres had a good depth of tread.
sentences.cn: 这种宽大的轮胎有很深的胎面花纹。

sentences.en: They are set to make a big fat profit.
sentences.cn: 他们下定决心要大赚一笔。

sentences.en: We are constantly being reminded to cut down our fat intake.
sentences.cn: 不断有人提醒我们要减少脂肪的摄入量。

sentences.en: You’ll get fat if you eat all that chocolate.
sentences.cn: 如果你把那些巧克力都吃了，就会变胖的。

words.tran_cn: 正被养肥的；用于养肥禽畜的
脂肪的；肥胖的；多脂肪的；脂肪过多的

phrases.tran_cn: [口语]肥缺，待遇丰厚的工作；意外的好运气
[美俚]有钱有势的人；谋求特权
[美口]希望渺茫；很少可能（作反语）
胖夫人（《哈利波特》里的人物）
（尤指因浪子回头而）设盛宴庆祝

phrases.phrase: live off (或 on) the fat of the land
phrases.tran_cn: 过锦衣玉食的生活，养尊处优

phrases.phrase: the fat is in the fire

trans.tran_en: weighing too much because you have too much flesh on your body
a substance that is stored under the skin of people and animals, that helps to keep them warm
weighing too much because you have too much flesh on your body
